title: Heavy Gear 2 Repack [sk-k.net].rar
description:
Heavy Gear 2 Repack.

Created April 2006.

Download Contents:

Heavy Gear 2 NRG image
Servers.dat zip file
HG2 noCD crack zip file
HG2 XP patch zip file
Readme file
PDF Manuals

Changes from the old Heavy Gear 2 torrent file:

Updated servers.dat file
Updated readme information
Added English/German/Italian/French PDF Manuals

-----

Directions:

Use NRG image compatible CD burning software (Nero, for instance) to burn the Heavy Gear 2 NRG image to a CD. Install from the CD and enjoy.

The Servers.dat file is required to play online. It must be copied into the main Heavy Gear 2 directory where it will replace the original Servers.dat file. This file is updated periodically. Any updates can be found at www.sk-k.net.

The WinXP Patch is required to sync with hosts using WinXP when playing online. Replace the winets2.dll and wudplan.dll files in Heavy Gear 2/Anet folder with the ones included in the Zip file.

A noCD crack is included, but some people have experienced some issues using this in WinXP, so hopefully it will work for you.

-----

Description from allgame.com:
[/i]"Heavy Gear II introduces a brand new 3D hardware-only engine, which brings with it quick combat-action, indoor battles, a new and realistic physics model and "photo-realistic terrain." Players can send complex commands to squad mates such as flanking maneuvers, ambushes, and diversions. Enemies will adapt to your plans and create tactics of their own.

To combat the threat on Terra Nova, player's forces will have to traverse a wide variety of settings such as swamps, grasslands, unstable volcanic areas, freezing arctic settings and cityscape. Through battle and scouting, you'll gather information to better understand just whom you are up against."[/i]
